channel.title: go on Data Lab Tech TV
channel.description: Recent content in go on Data Lab Tech TV

item.title: LabStore - Part 5 - Building an Object Store in Go: CLI - Command Line Interface
item.description: Learn how to build a CLI for your monorepo, with cobra and the charm stack.

item.title: LabStore - Part 4 - Building an Object Store in Go: IAM - Identity and Access Management
item.description: Building an IAM service on top of SQLite in Go, from config handling to proper secret encryption.

item.title: LabStore - Part 3 - Building an Object Store in Go: Benchmarking and Profiling
item.description: Benchmarking S3-compatible object stores—LabStore, MinIO, Garage, SeaweedFS, RustFS—and setting up a Go profiling to detect bottlenecks.

item.title: LabStore - Part 2 - Building an Object Store in Go: Authenticating with SigV4
item.description: Let's learn all about the inner workings of SigV4, used in S3-compatible object stores, to authenticate requests.

item.title: LabStore - Part 1 - Building an Object Store in Go: How Hard Can It Be?
item.description: Let's learn all about the inner workings of S3 object stores, along with enough Go to start building your own solution.
